occurrences.knownSentence: 我现在想和你说英语。
occurrences.targetSentence: I want to speak English with you now.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我想今天尽我所能地尝试。
occurrences.targetSentence: I want to try as hard as I can today.

occurrences.knownSentence: 因为我想认识会说英语的人。
occurrences.targetSentence: Because I want to meet people who speak English.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我现在想和你说英语。
occurrences.targetSentence: I want to speak English with you now.

occurrences.knownSentence: 因为我想认识会说英语的人。
occurrences.targetSentence: Because I want to meet people who speak English.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我期待尽快能说得更好。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我还不知道怎么说足够多的不同的单词。
occurrences.targetSentence: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你能再说一遍慢一点吗？
occurrences.targetSentence: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

occurrences.knownSentence: 我现在想和你说英语。
occurrences.targetSentence: I want to speak English with you now.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我现在会说一点英语了。
occurrences.targetSentence: I speak a little English now.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你现在感觉怎么样？
occurrences.targetSentence: How do you feel at the moment?

occurrences.knownSentence: 我正在努力学习。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm trying to learn.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我没有在想怎么回答。
occurrences.targetSentence: I was not thinking about how to answer.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？
occurrences.targetSentence: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?

occurrences.knownSentence: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。
occurrences.targetSentence: She didn't want to tell me where it was.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我觉得你做得很好。
occurrences.targetSentence: I think that you're doing very well.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我正在努力学习。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm trying to learn.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我学习大约一个星期了。
occurrences.targetSentence: I've been learning for about a week.

occurrences.knownSentence: 学英语不容易，但是很有趣。
occurrences.targetSentence: Learning English isn't easy but it is fun.

occurrences.knownSentence: 尽可能经常地说。
occurrences.targetSentence: how to speak as often as possible.

occurrences.knownSentence: 用英语怎么说
occurrences.targetSentence: how to say something in English

occurrences.knownSentence: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
occurrences.targetSentence: So I can remember how to say a few words.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我记不住我想说什么怎么说。
occurrences.targetSentence: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我还不知道怎么说足够多的不同的单词。
occurrences.targetSentence: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我要和别人练习说话。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我想在你说完之后能够说话。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

occurrences.knownSentence: 但是我不想停止说话。
occurrences.targetSentence: But I do not want to stop talking.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm going to start talking more soon.

occurrences.knownSentence: 尽快开始说话是很有用的。
occurrences.targetSentence: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你今晚想和我说话。
occurrences.targetSentence: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我不确定我能不能记住整个句子。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我不会轻易记住的。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.

occurrences.knownSentence: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
occurrences.targetSentence: So I can remember how to say a few words.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我记不住我想说什么怎么说。
occurrences.targetSentence: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

occurrences.knownSentence: 她想知道答案是什么。
occurrences.targetSentence: She wants to find out what the answer is.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我不需要知道一切。
occurrences.targetSentence: I do not need to know everything.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我知道下周我需要做的事情怎么做。
occurrences.targetSentence: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你想很快学会他的名字。
occurrences.targetSentence: You want to learn his name quickly.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我昨天想问你一件事。
occurrences.targetSentence: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我没有在想怎么回答。
occurrences.targetSentence: I was not thinking about how to answer.

occurrences.knownSentence: 他上周想给朋友写一封信。
occurrences.targetSentence: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你为什么想停下来？
occurrences.targetSentence: Why do you want to stop?

occurrences.knownSentence: 你想很快学会他的名字。
occurrences.targetSentence: You want to learn his name quickly.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我很快就要开始多说话了。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm going to start talking more soon.

occurrences.knownSentence: 你会在我必须走之前帮我吗？
occurrences.targetSentence: Are you going to help me before I have to go?

occurrences.knownSentence: 我不确定我能不能同时帮你。
occurrences.targetSentence: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要走了。
occurrences.targetSentence: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to go.

occurrences.knownSentence: 当我睡得不好的时候，我不喜欢起床。
occurrences.targetSentence: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我不喜欢花太多时间来回答。
occurrences.targetSentence: I do not like taking too much time to answer.

occurrences.knownSentence: 当我睡得不好的时候，我不喜欢起床。
occurrences.targetSentence: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

occurrences.knownSentence: 当别人在这里的时候，他不想安静。
occurrences.targetSentence: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.

occurrences.knownSentence: 她今天下午不想读任何东西。
occurrences.targetSentence: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我们不想打断这个故事。
occurrences.targetSentence: We don't want to interrupt the story.

occurrences.knownSentence: 他不想整个下午照顾那只小狗。
occurrences.targetSentence: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.

occurrences.knownSentence: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。
occurrences.targetSentence: She didn't want to tell me where it was.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
occurrences.targetSentence: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.

occurrences.knownSentence: 就是这样，如果你明白我的意思的话。
occurrences.targetSentence: It's like this, if you know what I mean.

occurrences.knownSentence: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
occurrences.targetSentence: So I can remember how to say a few words.

occurrences.knownSentence: 我喜欢和朋友一起做有趣的事情。
occurrences.targetSentence: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

occurrences.knownSentence: 他上周想给朋友写一封信。
occurrences.targetSentence: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

occurrences.knownSentence: 当你理解足够多的词汇时，这很有趣。
occurrences.targetSentence: It's interesting when you understand enough words.

occurrences.knownSentence: 学英语不容易，但是很有趣。
